synopsis.text: God has issued a challenging new directive to the Heaven's Design Team in episode 13, available exclusively on Amazon. The team, comprised of skilled professionals, is tasked with creating an animal that combines five distinct characteristics. This seemingly impossible task leaves the designers perplexed and scrambling to utilize their individual strengths. After much trial and error, the team manages to create a unique creature. Will this strange, combined animal satisfy their demanding client, or will they have to go back to the drawing board? Stay tuned to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
